name: Andy's Factory
description: Andyâ€™s factory is a platform jumping game for those who are looking to get some exercise or just have fun. The object of the game is simple, jump as far and high as you can! You will be running on top of large blocks that act like platforms in order to reach your ultimate goal: higher ground. In this runner jumper-style adventure games there's plenty more than meets the eye including fast paced levels with many obstacles such as spinning blades and spikes but don't worry if you fall off because Andy gives advice along the way about how best to do it next time around while also cheering at all your accomplishments made so far on his big jumpy world level!
